    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3241</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Phillys Oded's Poetry Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phillys Odeds Poesie-Seite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page de Poésie de Phillys Oded</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Página Da Poesia De Phillys Oded</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pagina Di Poesia Di Phillys Oded</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σελίδα ποίησης Oded Phillys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paginación De la Poesía De Phillys Oded</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THis site has a collection of original interactive English exercises using poetry as its foundation.Includes vocabulary and grammar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site hat eine Ansammlung ursprüngliche 
interaktive englische Übungen mit Poesie als sein foundation.Includes
Wortschatz und Grammatik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site a une collection d'exercices anglais 
interactifs initiaux en utilisant la poésie en tant que son 
vocabulaire et grammaire de foundation.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local tem uma coleção de exercícios 
ingleses interativos originais usando a poesia como seu vocabulário e
gramática de foundation.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo ha una collezione di esercitazioni 
inglesi interattive originali usando la poesia come il relativo 
vocabolario e grammatica di foundation.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">THis η περιοχή έχει μια συλλογή των αρχικών 
διαλογικών αγγλικών ασκήσεων που χρησιμοποιούν την ποίηση 
δεδομένου ότι το ίδρυμά του περιλαμβάνει το λεξιλόγιο και τη 
γραμματική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio tiene una colección de ejercicios 
ingleses interactivos originales usando poesía como su vocabulario y 
gramática de foundation.Includes.</string>
          </description>
